synopsis.text: Great King Enma's trusted aide, Hozuki, is a calm and composed demon with a knack for solving the myriad problems that plague Hell. From dealing with unruly folklore characters to quelling riots in Children's Limbo, Hozuki's responsibilities are as diverse as they are challenging. Despite his sadistic nature, he has a soft spot for cute animals and enjoys nurturing 'Goldfish Flowers' in his spare time. As he navigates the bureaucratic complexities of the underworld, Hozuki strives to maintain order while also uncovering secrets about his own origin. Join Hozuki and his eccentric co-workers as they manage the absurd and often hilarious trials of the afterlife, making each day in Hell anything but dull!
